QuestData.Title: The Deathforge
QuestData.Description: While you were taking care of the infernals at Legion Hold, I've been going over your reports. We've got no reason to believe the Legion lied about what's going on at the Deathforge. They're really cranking out infernals down there, so I've dispatched a scouting party to keep watch over it.$B$BIf we don't shut down the Deathforge, they'll rebuild the infernal stockpile that you destroyed at Legion Hold.$B$BReport to Scout Zagran atop Slag Watch, to the southeast of here and overlooking the Deathforge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Scout Zagran at Slag Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: <The orc nods.>$B$BIt'll be good to have the backup. We've gathered some preliminary information on what the Shadow Council is up to in there, but it's time for the hammer to fall.
